content.html: I’m a Christian. No, you’re an Atheist. How can you say that? There are 3000 Gods in the world, I don’t believe in 3000 of them and YOU don’t believe in 2999 of them… we’re BOTH Atheists. You call me an Atheist because I believe in 1 less God than you.
content.value:
I’m a Christian. 

No, you’re an Atheist. 

How can you say that?

There are 3000 Gods in the world, I don’t believe in 3000 of them and YOU don’t believe in 2999 of them… we’re BOTH Atheists. You call me an Atheist because I believe in 1 less God than you.
